          <title>
            <string language="en">Tap Wrench</string>
            <string language="es">Llave inglesa T</string>
            <string language="ga">Rinse Tapa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klopfen Sie Schlüssel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tapez La Clé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bata A Chave</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colpisca La Chiave Leggermente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γαλλικό κλειδί βρυσών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Details on how to make a simple tap wrench with some theory on thread cutting.</string>
            <string language="es">Detalles sobre cómo hacer una sencilla llave inglesa T con algunas teorías sobre cortar roscas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sonraí chun rinse tapa simplí a dhéanamh le roinnt teoiric ar ghearradh snáithe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Metalwork</string>
            <string language="es">Trabajo con metales. Proyecto</string>
            <string language="ga">Miotalóireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Project</string>
            <string language="ga">Tionscadal</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Details über, wie man einen einfachen 
Hahnschlüssel mit irgendeiner Theorie auf Gewindeausschnitt bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détails sur la façon dont faire une clé simple 
de prise avec une certaine théorie sur le découpage d'amorçage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Detalhes em como fazer uma chave simples da 
torneira com alguma teoria no corte da linha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Particolari su come fare una chiave semplice dal 
colpetto con una certa teoria sul taglio del filetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεπτομέρειες στο πώς να κάνει ένα απλό γαλλικό 
κλειδί βρυσών με κάποια θεωρία στην κοπή νημάτων.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
